name: Toad-al Destruction!
description:
Play against a friend or a computer player in a match to see who can knock down each other's towers first! Use WASD to aim and press "SPACE" as many times as possible during the countdown to launch your frogs! Winner is the one with the most bricks remaining.

Created for the "Mini Jam 106: Frogs"

*NOTE* The WebGL build has a problem that makes everything look very shiny.
